com.aurel.track.admin.server.siteConfig

Class OutgoingEmailBL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.admin.server.siteConfig.OutgoingEmailBL

  • public class OutgoingEmailBL
extends java.lang.Object
    It manages handling of the server configuration for outgoing e-mail connections.
